verses.verse: Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> on his <S%H8034>name!<s%> Make his <S%H5949>doings<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to <S%H2167>him,<s%> sing praises to <S%H7878>him!<s%> Tell of all his marvelous <S%H6381>works.<s%>
<S%H1984>Glory<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%> Let the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice.<s%>
<S%H1875>Seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and his <S%H5797>strength.<s%> <S%H1245>Seek<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> forever <S%H8548>more.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> his marvelous <S%H6381>works<s%> that he has <S%H6213>done;<s%> his <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%>
you <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> you <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> his chosen <S%H972>ones.<s%>
He is <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%> His <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He has <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations,<s%>
the covenant which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> his <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H3446>Isaac,<s%>
and <S%H5975>confirmed<s%> the same to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for a <S%H2706>statute;<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%>
<S%H559>saying,<s%> "To you I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> the <S%H2256>lot<s%> of your <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%>"
when they were but a few <S%H4962>men<s%> in <S%H4557>number,<s%> <S%H4592>yes,<s%> very few, and foreigners in <S%H1481>it.<s%>
They <S%H1980>went<s%> about from <S%H1471>nation<s%> to <S%H4467>nation,<s%> from one kingdom to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>
He <S%H3240>allowed<s%> no <S%H120>one<s%> to do them <S%H6231>wrong.<s%> <S%H3198>Yes,<s%> he reproved kings for their <S%H4428>sakes,<s%>
<S%H5060>"Don't<s%> touch my <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H5030>ones!<s%> Do my prophets no <S%H7489>harm!<s%>"
He <S%H7121>called<s%> for a <S%H7458>famine<s%> on the <S%H776>land.<s%> He <S%H7665>destroyed<s%> the <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H4294>supplies.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3130>them.<s%> Joseph was <S%H4376>sold<s%> for a <S%H5650>slave.<s%>
They <S%H6031>bruised<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> with <S%H3525>shackles.<s%> <S%H5315>His<s%> neck was <S%H935>locked<s%> in <S%H1270>irons,<s%>
until the <S%H6256>time<s%> that his <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H935>happened,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H565>word<s%> proved him <S%H6884>true.<s%>
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H5425>freed<s%> <S%H4910>him;<s%> even the ruler of <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and let him go <S%H6605>free.<s%>
He <S%H7760>made<s%> him <S%H113>lord<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4910>ruler<s%> of all of his <S%H7075>possessions;<s%>
to <S%H631>discipline<s%> his <S%H8269>princes<s%> at his <S%H5315>pleasure,<s%> and to teach his <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H2449>wisdom.<s%>
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> also <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1481>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham.<s%>
He <S%H6509>increased<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3966>greatly,<s%> and made them <S%H6105>stronger<s%> than their <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>
He <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H8130>hate<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H5230>conspire<s%> against his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> whom he had <S%H977>chosen.<s%>
They <S%H7760>performed<s%> <S%H226>miracles<s%> among <S%H4159>them,<s%> and wonders in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and made it <S%H2821>dark.<s%> They <S%H4784>didn't<s%> rebel against his <S%H1697>words.<s%>
He <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H4325>waters<s%> into <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H4191>killed<s%> their <S%H1710>fish.<s%>
Their <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8317>swarmed<s%> <S%H8317>with<s%> <S%H6854>frogs,<s%> even in the <S%H2315>rooms<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings.<s%>
He <S%H559>spoke,<s%> and swarms of <S%H6157>flies<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H3654>lice<s%> in all their <S%H1366>borders.<s%>
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H1259>hail<s%> for <S%H1653>rain,<s%> <S%H3852>with<s%> <S%H784>lightning<s%> in their <S%H776>land.<s%>
He <S%H5221>struck<s%> their <S%H1612>vines<s%> and also their fig <S%H8384>trees,<s%> and <S%H7665>shattered<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of their <S%H1366>country.<s%>
He <S%H559>spoke,<s%> and the <S%H697>locusts<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and the <S%H3218>grasshoppers,<s%> without <S%H4557>number,<s%>
ate <S%H398>up<s%> every <S%H6212>plant<s%> in their <S%H776>land;<s%> and <S%H398>ate<s%> up the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H776>ground.<s%>
He <S%H5221>struck<s%> also all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in their <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H7225>first<s%> fruits of all their <S%H202>manhood.<s%>
He brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold.<s%> There was not one <S%H3782>feeble<s%> person among his <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>
<S%H4714>Egypt<s%> was <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H3318>departed,<s%> for the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of them had fallen on <S%H5307>them.<s%>
He <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> for a <S%H4539>covering,<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> to give <S%H215>light<s%> in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
They <S%H7592>asked,<s%> and he <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H7958>quails,<s%> and <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>
He <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and <S%H4325>waters<s%> gushed <S%H2100>out.<s%> They <S%H1980>ran<s%> as a <S%H5104>river<s%> in the dry <S%H6723>places.<s%>
For he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
He brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H8342>joy,<s%> his <S%H972>chosen<s%> with <S%H7440>singing.<s%>
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> them the <S%H776>lands<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> They took the <S%H5999>labor<s%> of the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> in <S%H3423>possession,<s%>
that they might <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>observe<s%> his <S%H8451>laws.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah!<s%>
